ygData.subject: What should I do
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I have a problem.... I am a level 8 Human Wizard in Freeport, Xegony server. My problem is I do not have any friends playing EQ. My game so far has been
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I have a problem....

I am a level 8 Human Wizard in Freeport, Xegony server. My problem is I do not have any friends playing EQ. My game so far has been solo. The levels are coming very slow. I have grouped up with people several times. This turns into a nightmare. Most of the time we all just run around aimlessly, it takes so much time just to get sometime going its not really worth it.

Anyone have any suggestions? I have a friend who is going to buy the game soon, its just hard to wait. It took me 1 week to level up from 7 to 8.
Not to mention Humans can't see in the dark.

Sorry for the long winning post.

Thanks

Cornn (I love this game)
